events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred last night involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured vehicle in a road collision.
A claims agent has been assigned to assist the policyholder with the accident claim and guide through the process.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed it is being processed.
We requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair shop quotes.
An investigation team began examining the circumstances of the accident to assess liability and damages.
The investigation concluded that the insured driver was not at fault and the damage assessment is complete.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the vehicle and associated expenses.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager to proceed with payment issuance.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was completed and sent to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The claim file was officially closed following the successful completion of all claim procedures.
The closed claim documents were archived securely for future reference in accordance with policy.
